text.english: Teorema: Reversing a list doesn't change it's length, i.e. \[ \forall l \in L_A . \; \texttt{len}(\texttt{rev}(l)) = \texttt{len}(l) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: Rovesciare una lista non cambia la sua lungezza, i.e. \[ \forall l \in L_A . \; \texttt{len}(\texttt{rev}(l)) = \texttt{len}(l) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem len_rev: forall l : list , len (rev l) = len l.
